titleStmt.title: The letters patents of the presbyterie vvith the plea and fruits of the prelacie. Manifested out of the scriptures, fathers, ecclesiasticall histories, Papists, and sundrie other authors. By Iames Peregrin.
titleStmt.author: [Peregin, James].
Partridge, James, attributed name. aut

notesStmt.note: Formerly attributed to James Partridge. Quite probable that Peregrin is a pseudonym.
Errata on verso of H2, final leaf.
Identified as STC 19420 on UMI microfilm reel 1326.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
